sentences.sContent: I mind the time when we were in France together.
sentences.sContent_eng: I mind the time when we were in France together.
sentences.sCn: 我记得我们一起在法国的时候。

sentences.sContent: Now she has a job in France she can gratify her wish to see Europe.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now she has a job in France she can gratify her wish to see Europe.
sentences.sCn: 现在她有了个在法国工作的机会，她就可满足她游览欧洲的愿望。
